properties.displayName: Suspicious Path In Keyboard Layout IME File Registry Value
properties.query:
DeviceRegistryEvents
| where (RegistryKey contains "\\Control\\Keyboard Layouts" and RegistryKey contains "Ime File") and ((RegistryValueData contains ":\\Perflogs\\" or RegistryValueData contains ":\\Users\\Public\\" or RegistryValueData contains ":\\Windows\\Temp\\" or RegistryValueData contains "\\AppData\\Local\\Temp\\" or RegistryValueData contains "\\AppData\\Roaming\\" or RegistryValueData contains "\\Temporary Internet") or ((RegistryValueData contains ":\\Users\\" and RegistryValueData contains "\\Favorites\\") or (RegistryValueData contains ":\\Users\\" and RegistryValueData contains "\\Favourites\\") or (RegistryValueData contains ":\\Users\\" and RegistryValueData contains "\\Contacts\\")))

tags.name: description
tags.value:
Detects usage of Windows Input Method Editor (IME) keyboard layout feature, which allows an attacker to load a DLL into the process after sending the WM_INPUTLANGCHANGEREQUEST message.
